page.title: 03Wallasey Dockland
page.content: A trip along Dock Road illustrates the changing pattern of employment in the area.The{Docks}and a variety of support industries,{Milling}, {Warehousing,Propeller Manufacture}, were major employers until fairly recent times.While some of these activities remain,large areas of the dockland are derelict. For a brief period,they could be seen in their former glory in the summer of 1984 when the{Mersey}hosted the{Tall {Ships}.Sadly today,these once busy docks see the occasional arrival of ships carrying scrap iron and a variety of bulk liquids which are stored in large cylindrical containers used for the storing of{Molasses}to be added to the milled wheat for making animal foodstuffs. Where the old buildings have been cleared,a variety of smaa businesses
